body:
Hi everybody,



I am studying Honeybee and Ladybug, there are "Ankle Draft Discomfort" and "Draft Discomfort" components, but I cannot find suitable tutorial on website.

Someone have some suggestions?

Thanks a lot in advance



Solon
topic: How to use Ladybug_Ankle Draft Discomfort and Draft Discomfort

replies.body:
Hi Solon,



take a look at this example: [LB_draft discomfort](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Glazing_and_Winter_Comfort_Tool_-_SI&slide=0&scale=1&offset=10.580711117342616,34.06099185225317)



Antonello

Hi Antonello,



Thank you very much for your reply, I will research this example.



Solon

Hi Antonello, I am studying the file which was posted by you, there is a lot of information which is useful for me, Thank you again. I am trying to understand all components in file, but it seems it is difficult for me, could you please help me to understand some components of HB&LB, I attached a photo, I can understand some components which are indicated by green arrows, I can not understand some components which are marked by red line, could you please help me to understand these components of HB&LB. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/uTe6u2oo9t8I3-RJ4InWry7BpHGC4IY3ezKBh664eWbEdth9WihTCdyzIZcs8VSRVDYsRruMnvbNLpaiXP7qMQENOYBDYTFR/MRTCalculation.png) I also upload that photo. Thank you in advance. Solon
